channel.title: How do I make a client?
channel.description:
I have been searching all over for some kind of tutorial for making a client for a server and can't find anything anywhere...
If someone could help me by posting a link to a tutorial or helping me make a client it would be very helpful :)
I have a server and everything has been made and coded I just need help making a client...

item.title: How do I make a client?

item.description:

here you go http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,262886.msg2176226.html#msg2176226
